mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (email, user_name, user_phone, birth, branch_name, connected_id, branch_branch_name) VALUES (#{email}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{birth}, #{branchName}, #{connectedId}, #{branchBranchName})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_name = #{userName}, user_phone = #{userPhone}, birth = #{birth}, branch_name = #{branchName}, branch_branch_name = #{branchBranchName} WHERE email = #{email}
